basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Earl C. Rice Endowed Mathematics Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Mathematics and Statistics Scholarship Commi

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Math and Sciences pursing a degree in the Department of Mathematics and Statistics. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Major in Mathematics Education Full-time student Provide two faculty letters of reference

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Mathematics Education
criteria.raw_text: SIS_Major_2 is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Mathematics Education   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Mathematics Education

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
